message: Trafficking victims do not walk around with chains on them. They are not handcuffed to a bed. Traffickers use mental restraints to keep victims under their control.  The threat of violence to a child or a family member can keep victims from self-reporting.

data.description: A man charged with sex trafficking in Kansas City is a registered sex offender who allegedly forced a woman into prostitution.
data.title: He was a pimp and a babysitter, court docs allege in KC sex trafficking case
